00001 #!/usr/bin/env python
00002 # pygame + PyOpenGL version of Nehe's OpenGL lesson05
00003 # Paul Furber 2001 - m@verick.co.za
00004 
00005 from OpenGL.GL import *
00006 from OpenGL.GLU import *
00007 import pygame
00008 from pygame.locals import *
00009 
00010 rtri = rquad = 0.0
00011 
00012 def resize((width, height)):
00013     if height==0:
00014         height=1
00015     glViewport(0, 0, width, height)
00016     glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION)
00017     glLoadIdentity()
00018     gluPerspective(45, 1.0*width/height, 0.1, 100.0)
00019     glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW)
00020     glLoadIdentity()
00021 
00022 def init():
00023     glShadeModel(GL_SMOOTH)
00024     glClearColor(0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0)
00025     glClearDepth(1.0)
00026     glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST)
00027     glDepthFunc(GL_LEQUAL)
00028     glHint(GL_PERSPECTIVE_CORRECTION_HINT, GL_NICEST)
00029 
00030 def draw():
00031     global rtri, rquad
00032 
00033     glClear(GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT | GL_DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT); 
00034     glLoadIdentity();                                   
00035     glTranslatef(-1.5,0.0,-6.0)
00036 
00037     glRotatef(rtri,0.0,1.0,0.0)                 
00038 
00039     glBegin(GL_TRIANGLES)                               
00040 
00041     glColor3f(1.0,0.0,0.0)
00042     glVertex3f( 0.0, 1.0, 0.0)          
00043     glColor3f(0.0,1.0,0.0)
00044     glVertex3f(-1.0,-1.0, 1.0)
00045     glColor3f(0.0,0.0,1.0)      
00046     glVertex3f( 1.0,-1.0, 1.0)
00047     
00048     glColor3f(1.0,0.0,0.0)      
00049     glVertex3f( 0.0, 1.0, 0.0)
00050     glColor3f(0.0,0.0,1.0)      
00051     glVertex3f( 1.0,-1.0, 1.0)
00052     glColor3f(0.0,1.0,0.0)      
00053     glVertex3f( 1.0,-1.0, -1.0)
00054 
00055     glColor3f(1.0,0.0,0.0)      
00056     glVertex3f( 0.0, 1.0, 0.0)
00057     glColor3f(0.0,1.0,0.0)      
00058     glVertex3f( 1.0,-1.0, -1.0)
00059     glColor3f(0.0,0.0,1.0)      
00060     glVertex3f(-1.0,-1.0, -1.0)
00061                 
00062                 
00063     glColor3f(1.0,0.0,0.0)      
00064     glVertex3f( 0.0, 1.0, 0.0)
00065     glColor3f(0.0,0.0,1.0)      
00066     glVertex3f(-1.0,-1.0,-1.0)
00067     glColor3f(0.0,1.0,0.0)      
00068     glVertex3f(-1.0,-1.0, 1.0)
00069     glEnd()
00070 
00071 
00072     glLoadIdentity()
00073     glTranslatef(1.5,0.0,-7.0)
00074     glRotatef(rquad,1.0,1.0,1.0)
00075     glBegin(GL_QUADS)   
00076 
00077 
00078     glColor3f(0.0,1.0,0.0)
00079     glVertex3f( 1.0, 1.0,-1.0)
00080     glVertex3f(-1.0, 1.0,-1.0)          
00081     glVertex3f(-1.0, 1.0, 1.0)          
00082     glVertex3f( 1.0, 1.0, 1.0)          
00083 
00084     glColor3f(1.0,0.5,0.0)      
00085     glVertex3f( 1.0,-1.0, 1.0)
00086     glVertex3f(-1.0,-1.0, 1.0)          
00087     glVertex3f(-1.0,-1.0,-1.0)          
00088     glVertex3f( 1.0,-1.0,-1.0)          
00089 
00090     glColor3f(1.0,0.0,0.0)              
00091     glVertex3f( 1.0, 1.0, 1.0)
00092     glVertex3f(-1.0, 1.0, 1.0)          
00093     glVertex3f(-1.0,-1.0, 1.0)          
00094     glVertex3f( 1.0,-1.0, 1.0)          
00095 
00096     glColor3f(1.0,1.0,0.0)      
00097     glVertex3f( 1.0,-1.0,-1.0)
00098     glVertex3f(-1.0,-1.0,-1.0)
00099     glVertex3f(-1.0, 1.0,-1.0)          
00100     glVertex3f( 1.0, 1.0,-1.0)          
00101 
00102     glColor3f(0.0,0.0,1.0)      
00103     glVertex3f(-1.0, 1.0, 1.0)
00104     glVertex3f(-1.0, 1.0,-1.0)          
00105     glVertex3f(-1.0,-1.0,-1.0)          
00106     glVertex3f(-1.0,-1.0, 1.0)          
00107 
00108     glColor3f(1.0,0.0,1.0)      
00109     glVertex3f( 1.0, 1.0,-1.0)
00110     glVertex3f( 1.0, 1.0, 1.0)
00111     glVertex3f( 1.0,-1.0, 1.0)          
00112     glVertex3f( 1.0,-1.0,-1.0)          
00113     glEnd()     
00114 
00115     rtri  = rtri + 0.2                  
00116     rquad = rquad - 0.15                
00117     
00118 
00119 def main():
00120 
00121     video_flags = OPENGL|DOUBLEBUF
00122     
00123     pygame.init()
00124     pygame.display.set_mode((640,480), video_flags)
00125 
00126     resize((640,480))
00127     init()
00128 
00129     frames = 0
00130     ticks = pygame.time.get_ticks()
00131     while 1:
00132         event = pygame.event.poll()
00133         if event.type == QUIT or (event.type == KEYDOWN and event.key == K_ESCAPE):
00134             break
00135         elif event.type == KEYDOWN and event.key == K_a:
00136             resize((800,600))
00137 
00138         draw()
00139         pygame.display.flip()
00140         frames = frames+1
00141 
00142     print "fps:  %d" % ((frames*1000)/(pygame.time.get_ticks()-ticks))
00143 
00144 
00145 if __name__ == '__main__': main()
00146
